events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when the component changes the model; This event _isn't_ fired if the model is changed externally; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 当组件更改模型时发出;如果模型_isn外部更改，则t_触发此事件;也被 v-model 使用

events.name: before-transition
events.description: Emitted before transitioning to a new panel
events.description_zh: 在过渡到新面板之前发出

events.name: transition
events.description: Emitted after component transitioned to a new panel
events.description_zh: 在组件过渡到新面板后发出

vertical.description: Default transitions and swipe actions will be on the vertical axis
vertical.description_zh: 默认过渡和滑动操作将位于纵轴上

alternative-labels.description: Use alternative labels - stacks the icon on top of the label (applies only to horizontal stepper)
alternative-labels.description_zh: Use alternative labels - 将图标堆叠在标签顶部（仅适用于水平步进器）

contracted.description: Hide header labels on narrow windows
contracted.description_zh: 在窄窗口中隐藏标题标签

inactive-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
inactive-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
inactive-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

done-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix
done-icon.description_zh: 图标名称遵循 Quasar 约定;如果 'none' （String） 用作值，则它将遵循此状态的 prefix 或常规图标;确保已安装图标库，除非使用 'img：' 前缀
done-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

done-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

active-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix
active-icon.description_zh: 图标名称遵循 Quasar 约定;如果 'none' （String） 用作值，则它将遵循此状态的 prefix 或常规图标;确保已安装图标库，除非使用 'img：' 前缀
active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

error-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix
error-icon.description_zh: 图标名称遵循 Quasar 约定;如果 'none' （String） 用作值，则它将遵循此状态的 prefix 或常规图标;确保已安装图标库，除非使用 'img：' 前缀
error-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

error-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

header-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the header
header-class.description_zh: 要归属于标头的类定义

v-model.description: Model of the component defining the current panel's name; If a Number is used, it does not define the panel's index, but rather the panel's name which can also be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use the v-model directive.
v-model.description_zh: 定义当前面板名称的组件的模型;如果使用 Number ，则它不会定义面板的索引，而是定义面板的名称，该名称也可以是 Integer ;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令。

keep-alive.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native <keep-alive> component on the content
keep-alive.description_zh: 相当于<keep-alive>在内容上使用 Vue 的原生组件

keep-alive-include.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native include prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-include.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 include prop <keep-alive>for ;值必须是有效的 Vue 组件名称

keep-alive-exclude.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native exclude prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-exclude.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 exclude prop <keep-alive>for ;值必须是有效的 Vue 组件名称

keep-alive-max.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native max prop for <keep-alive>
keep-alive-max.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 max prop for <keep-alive>

animated.description: Enable transitions between panel (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)
animated.description_zh: 启用面板之间的过渡（另见 'transition-prev' 和 'transition-next' 属性）

infinite.description: Makes component appear as infinite (when reaching last panel, next one will become the first one)
infinite.description_zh: 使组件显示为无限（当到达最后一个面板时，下一个面板将成为第一个面板）

swipeable.description: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)
swipeable.description_zh: 启用滑动事件（可能会干扰内容的触摸/鼠标事件）

transition-prev.description: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-prev.description_zh: Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一（仅在设置了 'animated' prop 时有效）
transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-next.description: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-next.description_zh: Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一（仅在设置了 'animated' prop 时有效）
transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

slots.name: navigation
slots.description: Slot specific for the global navigation; Suggestion: QStepperNavigation
slots.description_zh: 特定于全局导航的插槽;建议： QStepperNavigation

slots.name: message
slots.description: Slot specific for putting a message on top of each step (if horizontal stepper) or above steps (if vertical); Suggestion: QBanner, div.q-pa-lg
slots.description_zh: 特定于在每个步骤顶部（如果是水平步进器）或步骤上方（如果垂直）放置消息的插槽;建议：QBanner， div.q-pa-lg
